ygData.subject: Re: SV: Dissappointed in EverQuest
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/29/99 12:57:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time, avron@alliances.org writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/29/99 12:57:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
avron@... writes:

<<
Hehe you wanna know something? I'm going to join Scarlet Horizon, but before
I can join I have to do this quest, and Galihad said my quest was to get
GhoulBane hehehe(btw Elayna ROCKS!:)
>>


Well we would love to have ya! Quests to join our guild are never easy, but
Galihad has given you a particularly tough one it seems :) It would also be
good if you visit our website and post some information about yourself on the
general message board.

Elayna does Rock! She is known as Guk Girl in our guild and has spent almost
all of her last 35 levels exclusively in upper and lower Guk (She is 47th lvl
now I believe). She is helped many a soul who have ran in to harms way in
that magnificent dungeon. She is our guilds Guk expert and she is still
discovering new things about Guk every week.

Wizaro WrathCaster <Scarlet Horizon>
Solusek Ro
